info.title: Escape Public API
info.description:
This API enables you to operate [Escape](https://escape.tech/) programmatically.

All requests must be authenticated with a valid API key, provided in the `Authorization` header.
For example: `Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY`.

You can find your API key in the [Escape dashboard](http://app.escape.tech/user/).

apiKey.name: Authorization
apiKey.description: API key to authenticate requests: `Authorization: Key YOUR_API_KEY`

200.description: List of applications matching the search query

post.description: Creates a new private location for the organization

get.description: Returns a list of all locations configured for the organization

delete.description: Deletes a private location from the organization

get.summary: Get a location by its ID
get.description: Returns details of a specific location
